params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
params.tierIndex: The index of the ticket tier from which tickets are to be consumed.

params.extraTime: The amount of time in seconds to extend the show's expiry.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.

proposeShow((string,string,address[],(in.details: This function initiates the creation of a show by validating the input parameters encapsulated in the proposal, then creates a new show based on these parameters. It is the entry point for organizers to propose new shows to the platform. The function requires that the caller is a registered organizer and that the artists included in the proposal are registered artists.

params.proposal: A `ShowProposal` struct containing all the necessary details for proposing a new show, including name, description, artist addresses, venue coordinates, radius, sell-out threshold, total capacity, ticket tiers, revenue split configuration, and the currency address for ticket sales.

returns.showId: The unique identifier for the newly proposed show, generated based on the proposal details.

params.proposalIndex: The index of the proposal in question.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
The unique identifier of the show for which the refund is requested.
params.ticketId: The unique identifier of the ticket being refunded.

params._artistRegistry: The address of the ArtistRegistry contract.
params._boxOffice: The address of the BoxOffice contract.
params._organizerRegistry: The address of the OrganizerRegistry contract.
params._referralContract: The address of the ReferralModule contract.
params._showVault: The address of the ShowVault contract.
params._ticketFactory: The address of the Ticket Factory contract.
params._venueFactory: The address of the Venue Factory contract.
params._venueRegistry: The address of the VenueRegistry contract.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
params.ticketProxy: The address to be set as the ticket proxy for the specified show ID.

params.newDate: The new date (timestamp) for the show.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show whose date is to be updated.

params.newVenue: The new venue details to be applied to the show.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
The unique identifier of the show.
params.status: The new status to be assigned to the show.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show to be evaluated.

The unique identifier of the show for which the refund is being withdrawn.

cancelShow(bytes32).notice: Cancels a show based on its unique identifier.

completeShow(bytes32).notice: Marks a show as completed, which may trigger fund distributions and other end-of-show processes.

consumeTicketTier(bytes32,uint256,uint25.notice: Consumes a specified number of tickets from a ticket tier for a given show.

extendShowExpiry(bytes32,uint256).notice: Extends the expiry time of a specific show.

getNumberOfVoters(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the number of voters for a specific show, including both artists and the organizer.

getOrganizer(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the organizer's address for a given show.

getShowById(bytes32).notice: Retrieves detailed information about a show by its unique identifier.

getShowExpiry(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the expiry time for a specific show.

getShowStatus(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the current status of a show based on its unique identifier.

getShowToTicketProxy(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the address of the ticket proxy for a given show.

getShowToVenueProxy(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the address of the ticket proxy for a given show.

getTicketTierInfo(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a specific ticket tier within a show.

hasTicket(address,bytes32).notice: Checks if a wallet owns at least one ticket for a specific show.

isArtist(address,bytes32).notice: Checks if the specified user is an artist in the given show.

isOrganizer(address,bytes32).notice: Checks if the specified user is the organizer of the given show.

payout(bytes32).notice: Initiates a payout of funds from a show's vault to the specified showId.

proposeShow((string,string,address[],(in.notice: Proposes a new show with detailed configuration encapsulated within a `ShowProposal` struct.

refundBribe(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a venue to refund a bribe if their proposal was not accepted for a show.

refundTicket(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows a ticket owner to request a refund for a specific ticket of a show, under certain conditions.

setProtocolAddresses(address,address,add.notice: Sets the protocol addresses for Ticket Factory, Venue Factory, Referral, Artist Registry, Organizer Registry, and Venue Registry contracts.

setShowToTicketProxy(bytes32,address).notice: Sets the address of the ticket proxy for a given show.

updateShowDate(bytes32,uint256).notice: Updates the date for an accepted show.

updateShowVenue(bytes32,(uint256,string,.notice: Updates the venue details for a specific show.

updateStatus(bytes32,uint8).notice: Updates the status of a show, potentially triggered by ticket sales reaching the sell-out threshold or other criteria.

updateStatusIfSoldOut(bytes32).notice: Checks and updates the status of a show to 'SoldOut' if ticket sales meet or exceed the sell-out threshold.

voteForEmergencyRefund(bytes32).notice: Allows ticket holders to vote for an emergency refund for a completed show

withdrawRefund(bytes32).notice: Allows a user to withdraw their refund for a previously refunded ticket.
